previewArticle.title: Chivas USA vs. Chicago Fire | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Chivas USA 3, Chicago Fire 2 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: A pair of clubs looking to make fresh starts meet to open the 2014 MLS campaign as Chivas USA play host to the Chicago Fire on Sunday afternoon at StubHub Center.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Chivas USA vs. Chicago Fire

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Tom Errington
timelineItems.text: Anangono doing the target man role well. Good hold up, good passing. Lack of support though. #CHIvCHV #CF97 #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Juan Luis Anangonó (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Chivas USA
timelineItems.text: 10’ No clear scoring opportunity for either team… We’re scoreless at the #StubHubCenter #CHVvCHI

timelineItems.name: Stevie P
timelineItems.text: Lots of people slipping out there. Pitch isn't great #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jhon Kennedy Hurtado (Chicago Fire).

timelineItems.name: Brendan Carr
timelineItems.text: #cf97 are looking decent. Rolfe and Alex pulling the strings.

timelineItems.name: Stevie P
timelineItems.text: We are looking a bit suspect on crosses #cf97

timelineItems.text: Ahhhhhh and #MLS is back!!! Chivas USA vs Chicago Fire �⚽️�⚽️��� excited  #chivasusa #fearthegoat #win #ilovesoccer #soccer #football #chvvschi

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chicago Fire. Conceded by Oswaldo Minda.

timelineItems.name: stubhubexperience
timelineItems.text: WE ALL CHEER FOR #chivasusa! HEY! #chivasusa! HEY! #chivasusa HEY! #blackarmy

Foul by Eric Avila (Chivas USA).

timelineItems.name: Brendan Carr
timelineItems.text: alex marauding up the pitch #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Chivas USA 3, Chicago Fire 2.

timelineItems.name: City Beautiful Game
timelineItems.text: Congrats @cdchivasusa for a hard fought 3 pts! #CHVvCHI

timelineItems.name: Carlos Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Deserved loss for #cf97. Painful, but definitely deserved. Lots of improvement to be made for this rebuilding team.

timelineItems.name: Elle
timelineItems.text: Well. Nowhere to go but up. #cf97 #BEBETTER

timelineItems.desc: A pair of clubs looking to make fresh starts meet to open the 2014 MLS campaign as Chivas USA play host to the Chicago Fire on Sunday afternoon at StubHub Center.

timelineItems.name: Nick Green
timelineItems.text: After 30 mins of this game, wonder which coach has the most work to do in weeks ahead: #ChivasUSA coach Cabrera or #Fire coach Yallop?

timelineItems.name: Robbie Diaz ⚽️⚽️⚽️
timelineItems.text: Ianni I warming up. Don't think the coaches are happy with the defense. #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chicago Fire. Conceded by Bobby Burling.
Offside, Chicago Fire. Jeff Larentowicz tries a through ball, but Juan Luis Anangonó is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Stevie P
timelineItems.text: Better in the attack by the @ChicagoFire in the last 10 mins #cf97

timelineItems.name: JR Patton
timelineItems.text: Maybe we can trade JLA to #imfc ... Or maybe MLS will discover a rule buried deep in the book that forces Frank to take him with #cf97

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: It's clearly a new era for #ChivasUSA. They've played 4 minutes and Oswaldo Minda hasn't even picked up a yellow card yet

timelineItems.name: Misanthropester
timelineItems.text: I am genuinely surprised by how even this match has been & how #chivasusa has gotten the better of attack #cf97

timelineItems.name: Evan Stahr
timelineItems.text: I thought Yallop was supposed to change the tactics...looks like a lot of the same hoofball that Klopas played right now. #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Lovel Palmer (Chicago Fire).
Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: ⚽️Jëff Kräuse⚽️
timelineItems.text: Once you bring in Amarikwa, move Rolfe out wide, sit Duka, slot Magee and Joya side by side. You're welcome. #cf97

timelineItems.name: Ron Haub
timelineItems.text: 2 shots 1 on target, anemic offense making this feel a lot like the start of last season #cf97

timelineItems.name: D
timelineItems.text: The counter works. #CHVvCHI and I have to add that Chivas USA is an improved defensive side.

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Chris 'Coz' Costello
timelineItems.text: Was going to say "let's see how this team responds," which still sorta applies, but we have some of our answer. Duka got beat. #cf97

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: petro62
timelineItems.text: So will we do like last year and get two goals behind and then decide to play? Yay 2014 #cf97

timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA went the last nine games of the 2013 season without scoring as many as 2 goals

timelineItems.text: Benji Joya with his Fire debut. One sub left and Magee remains on the sideline. Still time for a comeback. #cf97

timelineItems.text: At the first game of the season! #Chivasusa

timelineItems.name: Scott Fenwick
timelineItems.text: VAMOS LA MAQUNIA ROJA! ESTA DIA TENEMOS QUE GANAR! #cf97 #MLS #CHVvCHI

timelineItems.name: John Dunlevy
timelineItems.text: 13' to kickoff #cf97

timelineItems.name: Elmur Souza
timelineItems.text: Alineaciones confirmadas #ChivasUSA vs #ChicagoFire @TWCDeportes @pulpozuniga @TVCDeportes @soccerfede @gvlo2008 http://t.co/KTM4ofSzbM

timelineItems.name: Elmur Souza
timelineItems.text: Alineaciones confirmadas #ChivasUSA vs #ChicagoFire @TWCDeportes @pulpozuniga @TVCDeportes @soccerfede @gvlo2008 http://t.co/KTM4ofSzbM

timelineItems.name: Michael Flores Mota
timelineItems.text: #chivasusa vs #chicagofire came to watch a game before Futsal #stubhubcenter

timelineItems.name: Eric J. Kekeis
timelineItems.text: Come on #cf97. 3 point mentality. Go for the kill!

timelineItems.name: zayra
timelineItems.text: So excited the game is about to start :) VAMOS @cdchivasusa ! #CHIVASUSA

timelineItems.name: Greg Lalas
timelineItems.text: Dale, Dale, Chivas U-S-A! #CHVvCHI #MLS #TeamLA

timelineItems.name: Alicia Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Somewhat muted atmosphere at the stadium today, as you might expect. Still, nice day and we'll see if the players are ready!

timelineItems.name: Jeremy Mikula
timelineItems.text: #CHVvCHI about to start. When #cf97 opened last season at StubHub Center, Mike Magee scored a hat-trick..... for LA. No worries this time.

timelineItems.name: BetoPedroza
timelineItems.text: @mluiscastillo @rocampo @TVCDeportes Quien ganaria de un partido entre @Chivas y @ChivasUSA?? Yo digo que #ChivasUSA

timelineItems.desc: Goal! Chivas USA 3, Chicago Fire 2. Bobby Burling (Chivas USA) header from very close range to the top left corner. Assisted by Mauro Rosales on a corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Bobby Burling scores a towering header to give Chivas the lead

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: ⚽️Jëff Kräuse⚽️
timelineItems.text: Duka's crosses have had a tired look for 30 mins. Hope fitness isn't an issue for him again this year. #cf97 cc: @MLS_Analyst

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Gonzalo Segares.

timelineItems.name: Steve Sanders
timelineItems.text: Fire didn't deserve points today. Not playing to win #cf97

timelineItems.name: Eduardo Mendez
timelineItems.text: Golf clap for @cdchivasusa. Knew this team would be at least competitive and fun to watch in 2014. Things on the up and up. #CHVvCHI

timelineItems.name: Nick Green
timelineItems.text: Sign hoisted by @BlackArmy1850 before today's #ChivasUSA game read "Thank you MLS." I'll second that.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).
Quincy Amarikwa (Chicago Fire) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: City Beautiful Game
timelineItems.text: Well the game IS competitive. #CHVvCHI

timelineItems.name: MLS Fantasy Insider
timelineItems.text: Bakary Soumare got absolutely dominated by Bobby Burling. Probably not the best feeling I assume. #CHVvCHI

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Dani Fragoso (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Jeff Larentowicz.

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: That was the 2nd career goal for Bobby Burling of #ChivasUSA. His first came in 2010 with San Jose

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Benji Joya (Chicago Fire).
Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Chris Martz
timelineItems.text: TRES PUNTOS #ChivasUSA #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Chivas USA 3, Chicago Fire 2.
